answers.answer: I would go to your dr and get your blood pressure checked. Good luck!
I'm bout to head in i called and they said possible preclampsia ;/
My blood pressure has been ranging from 98- 101 over mid 8's last appt. It was 117/something and when they checked it at hospital they said it's 125/85 i believe so they said everything is fine
Should i be worried that it has been creeping up or don't worry?
I dunno. But my friend developed Pre-eclampsia and a few days later went into labor at 27 weeks. Just watch out for signs of labor until you can get to the doctor.

Preeclampsia/ hellp syndrome I just had that I wasn't do until Dec27 I had to end up having my baby early October 8 28weeks. I was having the same face swelling n hands n head ach. Go to the hospital ASAP

Preeclampsia/ hellp syndrome I just had that I wasn't do until Dec27 I had to end up having my baby early October 8 28weeks. I was having the same face swelling n hands n head ach. Go to the hospital ASAP
I went to the hospital and they said everything is fine.. they said my blood pressure isn't high enough to be preclampsia
Okay so I don't need to be worried? I just don't like how it creeping up the way it has been..

question: So today out of no where my face and hands became very swollen. It started out lightly and now my fingers hurt to close them and my face feels so full :/ any tips? I would greatly appreciate it.. not sure what to do
title: swollen face and hands?
